text:
Instagram

Kardashian's attorney Robert Shapiro told E! News in a statement, "Rob and Chyna working together put the best interest of their child first and have amicably resolved their personal matters."

Chyna's attorney offered no details about child support payments.

After Chyna obtained her restraining order, Rob's attorney Robert Shapiro told reporters the reality star and his ex "are both working together to do what's in the best interest" of Dream, "On Mr. Kardashian's behalf, I'd like to apologize for the events that have taken place. Moving forward, the priority is the well-being of the child."

A week after Rob's X-rated Instagram rant against Chyna, a source told E! News he was getting counseling, adding, "He wants to be the best dad possible."
title: Rob Kardashian and Blac Chyna Reach Custody Agreement Over Baby Dream

og.title: Rob Kardashian and Blac Chyna Reach Custody Agreement Over Baby Dream - E! Online
og.description: They split earlier this year and in July, Rob went on an X-rated rant against his ex, spurring her to obtain a temporary restraining order against him
